Description: Bronze axe-head: of more slender form than ill and with elongated lugs. The butt is uneven. The blade has been cleaned of corrosion product. There is considerable pitting all over. The cutting edge is turned and indented through use.
Bibliographic references: Davies 1987 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities in the British Museum (112)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
